hero.label: Partnership Opportunities
hero.description: Partner with the first professional gymnastics league. Reach a passionate, underserved audience with year-round engagement opportunities.

gapCallout.text: Gymnastics has massive global interest but no professional ecosystem. No repeatable events. No team culture. No scalable revenue model.
gapCallout.suffix: with a spectator-first format designed for growth.

cashPrize.title: Cash Prize Partners
cashPrize.description: Support athlete rewards directly. Your brand associated with the prize pool and winner presentations.

merchApparel.title: Merch & Apparel Partners
merchApparel.description: Outfit the competition. Exclusive branding on official Battle Royale merchandise and team apparel.

equipmentServices.title: Equipment & Services Partners
equipmentServices.description: Provide equipment, technology, or services. Long-term association with the league infrastructure.

whatPartnersGet.heading: WHAT PARTNERS RECEIVE
benefits: Event-day visibility: logo placement, announcements, branded areas
Digital presence: website, social media, live stream integration
Direct access to the gymnastics community through Gym Art platform
Hospitality: VIP access, meet-and-greets with athletes
Long-term association with the first professional gymnastics league

contact.description: Interested in partnering with Battle Royale? Reach out to discuss how we can create value together.
